name: Pardada Pardadi Educational Society
briefDescription: PPES is on an ambitious mission to make a visible change in ruralIndia by grooming young girls to become socially and economically independent and to serve as acatalyst for positive transformation in rural India. It goes beyond education by implementing a robustmodel backed by a fully functioning academic school for girls and a vocational training and productioncentre for women (including PPES graduates). Our interventions are targeted at creating opportunitiesof inclusive development such as- girl child education (primary and higher both), health & hygieneprograms, livelihood generation and social empowerment. We have over 1400 girls from 65 villages, studying at PPES, over 3000 women as Self Help group members. We have given over 300 graduates till now.
